tethys.TemporalDownscaling.TemporalDownscaling.AnnualtoMontlyUniform¶

tethys.TemporalDownscaling.TemporalDownscaling.AnnualtoMontlyUniform(WD, years)¶

Global gridded annual water withdrawal to monthly water withdrawal For Livestock, Mining and Manufacturing: Uniform distribution WD : spatially downscaled water withdrawal (dimension: 67420 x nyear) years : list of years for temporal downscaling
